channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17289] Avoid adding a replication peer named "lock"
item.description: When zk based replication queue is used and useMulti is false, the steps of transfer replication queues are first add a lock, then copy nodes, finally clean old queue and the lock. And the default lock znode's name is "lock". So we should avoid adding a peer named "lock".
item.summary: Avoid adding a replication peer named "lock"

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.

comments.comment:

Looks good overall.


71	  public final static String RS_LOCK_ZNODE = "lock";

The variable can be package private.
Thanks. This variable can be used in test, too. It is a different package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.replication.
Is it possible to add the test in the same package ?
Yes, I can do it by adding new ut... But I thought it is ok to be public. Because this is a final String as constant. And in branch-1, it can be used on ReplicationZKNodeCleaner and it is public too.
I check all unit tests about addPeer method and it is suitable to add ut in TestReplicationAdmin. Thanks.
